text: Music Is Magic is a 1935 American musical movie directed by George Marshall and based on the play of the same name by Jesse Lasky Jr. and Gladys Unger. It stars Alice Faye, Bebe Daniels, Ray Walker, Frank Mitchell and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1935 musical movies Category:American musical movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by George Marshall
title: Music Is Magic
